original_text:
“Oh, that I were as in the months of old,
    as in the days when God watched over me,
korean_text: 나는 지난 세월과 하나님이 나를 보호하시던 때가 다시 오기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: Oh, that I were as in the months of old,
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 내가 옛적 그 달들에 있었더라면,

sentences.original_text: as in the days when God watched over me,
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 나를 지켜주시던 그 날들에 있었던 것처럼,
